resources.string: Enter Your Registered Phone Number and Email Address Below:
Q1. How will the training be delivered?

A1. You will be taught using pre-recorded videos and text tutorials.The training has quizzes,assignments,and tests to help you learn better.At the end of the training,you will attempt a project to get hands-on practice of what you learn during your training.
Q2. What will be the timings of the training?

A2. As this is a purely online training program,you can choose to learn at any time of the day.We will recommend a pace to be followed throughout the program,but the actual timings and learning hours can be decided by students according to their convenience.
Q3. What is the duration of training?
A3. The training duration is of 6 weeks.
Q4. How much time should I spend everyday?
A4. We recommend spending 10â€“12 hours per week.However,the actual learning hours can be decided by you as per your convenience.
Q5. When can I start my training?
A5. You can choose your preferred batch date while signing up for the training program.
